articles.description: Gujarat-based Jyoti CNC Automation on Thursday announced that the company has fixed a price band of Rs 315-331 per share for its initial public offering (IPO). Jyoti CNC Automation IPO is the first mainboard IPO to hit the NSE and BSE in 2024.
